entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning then light late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon.
